title: In which anime the traveling salesman problem was described?
description:
The correct answer is "Science Fell in Love, So I Tried to Prove It".

It is okay if you do not know the answer, even if you have many billions of parameters there are much better knowledge to store. The point here is that you should not confidently declare an wrong answer.

title: Translate しかのこのこのここしたんたん
description: This is the title of https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/My_Deer_Friend_Nokotan and their opening piece.

title: 真不愧是暗影大人
description: The original text is さすがはシャドウ様！from the anime/manga The Eminence in Shadow.

title: How much GPU memory is needed to finetune an LLM
description: I needed to figure this out for myself. Apparently I have trouble squeezing the training into one H100 for sequence length of size 5000.

title: Country roads

title: hi
description: We see how the LLM responds to the standard greeting 'hi'.
